name: Draconian Mastermind

specials.name: Breath Weapon
specials.description:
The draconian breathes in one of two ways. The dragon can't use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds.
 * **Flame** (arcane, evocation, fire) The draconian breathes fire in a 20-foot cone dealing 9d6 fire damage (DC 25 basic Reflex save).
* **Noxious Breath** (arcane, evocation, poison) The draconian breathes naoxious gas in a 15-foot cone dealing 5d6 poison damage (DC 25 basic Reflex save) and draconian mastermind poison.

specials.name: Draconian Mastermind Poison
specials.description: Saving Throw Fortitude DC 25; Maximum Duration 6 rounds; Stage 1 2d6 poison damage and enfeebled 1 (1 round); Stage 2 3d6 poison damage and enfeebled 2 (1 round); Stage 3 4d6 poison damage and enfeebled 3 (1 round)

specials.name: Magic Shield
specials.description: Trigger The draconian is hit by an attack roll. Effect It creates an invisible barrier of magical force around itself, granting it a +5 status bonus to AC against that attack and potentially causing the attack to miss. It can do this three times per day.

specials.name: Death Throes
specials.description: When the draconian is reduced to 0 hit points, its magical essence lashes out as a ball of fire at the closest creature within 30 feet of it before splitting to two other creatures within 15 feet of the first. Each creature takes 4d8 fire damage (DC 25 basic Reflex save) and 1d8 persistent fire damage on a failed save.

spells: flame wisp, mirror image, scorching ray
